name: The Origami Master
description: A master of the Origami art. The 'Origami Master' always keeps a piece of paper in her pocket in case she finds herself waiting. She's got terrific precision and a calm and patient spirit.

name: The Wanderer
description: A true nature lover and seeker of adventures. The owner of this card has hiked the highest peak of South Korea (Hallasan) as well as Peñalara (Spain), Sächsische Schweiz (Germany) and many others. Beware of her agility, keep her in sight.

name: The Linguaphile
description: Some people study languages to open new doors but 'The Linguaphile' learns them for fun. She needs constant exposure to languages, otherwise her day might feel empty. Sprich sie an, sie wartet auf dich!

name: The Sudoku Sensei
description: Nothing feels better for the 'Sudoku Sensei' than solving a complex problem. Patient, resolute and rational, the 'Sudoku Sensei' will always persevere.
